column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////If you tryna come here for brunch on a Saturday or Sunday like I did
column2: good luck... it is packed-and for good reason!  My friend and I quickly got in line and started to look at the menu and drool over the fresh pastries on display.  That pistachio croissant looked so freaking good
column3: I knew I had to order one.  In addition to that
column4: I also ordered a croque madame and a latte for dine-in.  After paying
column5: the cashier handed me a number for my order and as I began to look around the room
column6: I got scared that we wouldn't be able to find a seat.  However
column7: an employee gestured me over and said that there was a table so phew!!!
